settings.text: IMPORTANT: Please note that each product listed on our website is sold individually and comes in various styles and sizes. Each item also has its own unique price. You have the freedom to choose and combine products according to your preference. To help you make the best choice, we provide sample images and size charts for each product.

settings.title: Details
settings.content:
• Made from 100% linen
  • Packaged in a beautiful gift box
  • All local and international shipments are sent by registered air mail and come with a tracking number. Express shipping is also available.
  • If you need your order quickly, we offer express delivery for an additional cost. You can expect to receive your order in less than 3-4 days worldwide.
  • Orders typically take 1-4 days to be made and sent.
  • Please note that colors may appear slightly different in real life due to monitor settings.
  • If you would like to ensure a perfect color match, you can request fabric samples.
  • For weddings, we can help you find the perfect pattern or color to match your specific needs.
  • If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.

settings.title: Return & exchange
settings.content:
MenLau ships from a Lithuania (Europe).

Delivery time is calculated from when the package leaves our studio. All our products are made to order, usually items are shipped within 2 - 5 business days after clear payment is made.

We will not be able to change the shipping address once the order has shipped.

SHIPPING INFORMATION

WORLDWIDE SHIPPING PRICE AND TIME RATES

Via national registered post service.

  • Shipping takes around 10-20 working days (depends on your shipping address location)
  • Items are sent as priority registered airmail.
  • Price starts from 6 EUR 

Via DHL, FEDEX,TNT express:

  • Shipping takes 3-5 days (depends on your shipping address location)
  • Price is from 35 EUR 

EUROPE SHIPPING PRICE AND TIME RATES

Via national registered post service.

  • Shipping takes around 10-15 working days (depends on your shipping address location)
  • Items are sent as priority registered airmail.
  • Price is from 6 EUR 

Via DHL, FEDEX, TNT express:

  • Shipping takes around 3-5 days (depends on your shipping address location)
  • Shipping price starts from 35 EUR 

RETURNS + EXCHANGES

If by any reasons you are not satisfied by the item you bought from my shop, I guarantee money return with no questions asked ONLY if the following requirements have been fulfilled:

- You must inform me about return within: 14 days of delivery.
- the item is returned in its original packaging and condition, UNUSED.
- If you wish to return an item, please contact me before sending it back. Buyers are responsible for return shipping costs. If the item is not returned in its original condition, the buyer is responsible for any loss in value.
- This does NOT applies to custom-made, made to order or personalized items
- If you need a specific color or shade please order fabric sample. If you purchase an item without requesting fabric sample, this order is not a subject of return because of color match.
